Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=64 µg/ml), Bacillus anthracis (MIC=64 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has strong bacteriostatic activity against several species of bacteria, including Staphylococcus aureus and Bacillus anthracis.

Literature.Title: A linguistic model for the rational design of antimicrobial peptides.
Literature.Author: Loose C, Jensen K, Rigoutsos I, Stephanopoulos G.
